channel.title: Dual Arena Dupe DeathlyPvpz & Fun Code [317 PI]
channel.description:
[center][b]Hey guys i wanted to add some think to my server to make the server fun
its a Deathlypvpz v4.1 source i have been working on this server for a long time now and released a couple of weeks ago. we have around 30 - 60 active players a day.
was searching for a mini game or some think you think is very cool to be added to a 317 pi server.
Does Anyone know??
Also there is a duel arena dupe which i want to fix no idea how players are doing so... but maybe i could replace the dualandtrade to a new code or anythink??
if anyone could help me that would be good! [/b][/center]

item.title: Dual Arena Dupe DeathlyPvpz & Fun Code [317 PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

havilad, just telling us that there is a dupe does absolutely nothing about it.
We need to know what’s wrong before we can attempt to help fix it.

As for the first question about the minigame, yeah either google for some or create your own. We’re not here to code for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Arena Dupe DeathlyPvpz & Fun Code [317 PI]
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:540970”]How the hell do you have that many players and not know how to fix simple dupes.

Your server fails to check the duel/items properly.[/quote]

Thanks for the support lmao

i have been searching for a couple of days now no idea how they are going this dupe or how to fix this… thats why im asking for help

Read full topic
